name: I Heard by Decree
description:
(For a better experience play with headphones)

Controls:

WASD: move character

Left Click:  Open Doors, Shake Chest or select options

Right Click: Open Mark menu for doors  and chest

Explore the dungeons and use your Sense of hearing to mark all the doors with the correct "Monster Tag" and find the exit. Can you make it before the time's up?

You can challenge your self by marking all the chest but be carefull some of them have traps or monsters inside them, shake them to heard what is inside of them, but run out of their range if it sound Dangerous!!

[We are still working in the dungeon procedeural building if the game freezes on loading, please, try again closing and opening the program]
